STM32CubeL4 Firmware Package V1.5.2 / 12-September-2016

Main Changes
  • Patch release to fix issues in HAL drivers (see Drivers\STM32L4xx_HAL_Driver\Release_Notes.html)
  • Template projects updated (stm32l4xx_hal_conf.h in line with latest STM32L4xx_HAL_Driver template)
  • Few Applications and Examples projects updated (MDK-ARM stack/heap fix, Project configuration files)
